page.title: 18Songs of Experience
page.content: Over 30 boys from our school are involved in a play which is being produced by the BBC. The play is about 3 boys that are fanatical about steam engines. Thet go out to spend a day train spotting and it turns into a disaster, as they get caught by the railway police and end up arguing amongst themselves about the leadership of their gang. The children from our school were auditioned in school, and then went to Keighley to do the shooting. The boys all had to have special haircuts and wear long baggy shorts, as the play is set in 1960. The boys spent 2 days shooting, during which time they had to jump on and off trains, and were showered with sprinklers for a rain scene. 3 of the pupils hae obtained major roles in the production.
